description: Detects when an admin share is mounted using net.exe
author: oscd.community
Teymur Kheirkhabarov @HeirhabarovT
Zach Stanford @svch0st
wagga
name: Windows Admin Share Mount Via Net.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("net.exe" OR "net1.exe"))) AND (process.command_line.text:"*\ use\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \\\\\*\\\*$*"))
